```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(stats)
library(graphics)
library(plotly)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

## Iris Scatterplot with colors

```{r}
plot_ly(iris, x = iris$Sepal.Length, y = iris$Petal.Length, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", color = as.factor(iris$Species))
```
## Iris Continous Color
```{r}
plot_ly(iris, x = iris$Sepal.Length, y = iris$Petal.Length, type = "scatter", mode = "lines", color = as.factor(iris$Species))
```

## Iris Boxplot
```{r}
plot_ly(iris, y = iris$Petal.Length, color = iris$Species, type = "box")
```
